divs: Sighting Detailscame out of the kitchen at 11:30 am and look at the sky and saw two object ( spheres) stay there for a few second and called my daughter to come out to seethe two objects but she did not see the objects they where far away already try to focus more if they where birds but no flaping of wings they they made into one and disapeared. this is not the first time i see this spheres on another day me and my dad saw a silver changing shape and color disc in the same area going into the opposive direction of the wind. i am allways looking into the sky for obejects or UFOS
Summary: two spheres close toghter than turn in to one and desapeared all lasted for at least 1 to 1 1/2 minutes
